/circle6 If aft er eight hours, there is no increase in intensity/
frequency/duration of contractions, the membranes are not 
ruptured and there is no progress in cervical dilatation, ask 
the woman to relax. Advise her to come/send for you again 
when the pain/discomfort increases, and/or there is vaginal 
bleeding, and/or the membranes rupture.
